title: 조건문 2형 기초 — If I were/had
intent: If I were you, If I had money 등으로 가상의 상황과 조언을 자연스럽게 표현한다.
lexset: were, had, could, would, might, rich, young, free, different, possible, advice, choice
traps: was vs were in conditional(If I was vs If I were)
주절 조동사(I would go, not I will go)

seeds.kr: 내가 너라면 그렇게 안 할 거야.
seeds.en: If I were you, I wouldn't do that.
If I had money, I would travel.
If I had time, I could help you.
If I were young, I would study again.
It would be nice if he came.
What would you do if you were rich?

seeds.kr: 다시 선택할 수 있다면 달리 할 거야.
seeds.en: If I could choose again, I would do differently.
If she were here, she would help.
If I had a car, I would pick you up.
If I were free, I would travel the world.
